title: Objects colliding only with mesh edges.

content.raw:
Hi,

There is an issue with objects colliding with meshes (both .stl and .dae), they seem to only collide with the edges of the meshes.

For the test case I used primitive spheres colliding with the mesh. Here are links to videos showing the issue:

[vid1](https://vimeo.com/118601974)
[vid2](https://vimeo.com/118601979)
[vid3](https://vimeo.com/118601980)
[vid4](https://vimeo.com/118601984)
[vid5](https://vimeo.com/118601986)

The mesh model is uploaded under the name of mug.tar.gz. Tested under Gazebo version 4.0.1, however the issue was present for a while.

Cheers,
Andrei
content.html:
Hi,

There is an issue with objects colliding with meshes (both .stl and .dae), they seem to only collide with the edges of the meshes.

For the test case I used primitive spheres colliding with the mesh. Here are links to videos showing the issue:

vid1 vid2 vid3 vid4 vid5

The mesh model is uploaded under the name of mug.tar.gz. Tested under Gazebo version 4.0.1, however the issue was present for a while.

Cheers, Andrei
